responses.text: What sort of things do you trade?

dynamic_line: Don't worry.  These are mutant mushrooms, not alien mushrooms.  They won't take over your brain much.
Just a crusty old shroomer.  I've been growing mushrooms, of one type or another, for many years.  But they didn't used to get quite so big.
We're the Morlocks, a bunch of weirdos who couldn't fit in with the rest of the world.  But now we're the most normal people left.

responses.text: I'm not so sure about that.

dynamic_line: There's no official way to join.  Just move into an empty house, and in a decade or two you'll be a morlock.

The Morlocks are always short on food since not much grows down here in the dark.  I got no surplus crops to sell.  But if you could get me some fertilizer, I'd help you kickstart your own shroom-room.  I'll swap you 12 seeds for each bag of commercial fertilizer you haul down here.  Not much, but it get will you started.

responses.text: I'd like to get some seeds, my good shroomer.
[$100] I'd like to buy some ~specialty~ mushrooms.
